extendedInfo.description: DescriptionBrunei Yellow Pages App is the only official search results provider of the Brunei Darussalam Telephone Directory - Yellow Pages, White Pages & Government Pages.Find trusted information on businesses, companies, people, government listings, maps, driving directions, restaurants, shops, consumer reviews, local landmarks and more!App features include :Find Business and ServicesSimply key in a category or the companyâs name, choose an area and results of listings will display details of businesses you may be looking for, and tap on the contact number to call.Find People or Residential ListingsFind contact information of friends or relatives in all districts. Search by name and with call with a single tap or save information to your address book.Find Government ListingsFind contact information of government ministries, department, offices and personnel.Map, Directions & Location DetectionUse your mobile smart devices to locate business or services nearest to you. Or find businesses you are looking for, and your mobile device will map your quickest route to its location.Voice SearchInstead of typing, tap the âspeakâ icon, name the business and location to display a list of your search results.Reserve Look upFind more details of businesses or people by their phone numbers.Save, Review or ShareAdd search results to your contact list. Make recommendations of your favorite shop or restaurant or share information with friends via your favorite social media

reviews.title: Please UPDATE your app
reviews.comment: Kudos for a fabulous effort in making this kind of app. I understand the difficulties you\'ve been through in making this as a success. However, it is very upsetting to see the development of this app. Why there is no update at all? And I\'ve tried your app to search for ATM nearby MoH. Just to try out how practical it is. Sadly it doesn\'t shows ATM at MoF and ATMs at post-office, Jalan Lapangan Terbang Lama. Shocking, it shows ATMs as far as up to Sengkurong area. :( Please for this one time, make us proud!
reviews.author: A Google User
